main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Columbus, Ohio on 31st January 1952 by a private civilian. The sighting involved a group of 5 to 7 large spheroid-shaped objects observed hovering at a very great altitude in the evening.
interesting points: The report indicates that the observed objects were spheroid in shape and of a large size.
The sighting was reported by a private civilian in Columbus, Ohio, adding credibility to the report.
The objects were observed hovering at a very great altitude, indicating advanced capabilities.
The handwritten note at the bottom right of the report seems to conclude that the observed object was a hot air balloon, raising questions about the accuracy of the conclusion.
The report mentions that the observation type was 'ground', suggesting that the objects were observed from the ground rather than from an aircraft.
sighted object: 5 to 7 large spheroid-shaped objects hovering at a very great altitude
photographs: The report does not specify the presence of photographs
